Reference

Skeleton Functions

Page and header wrappers

dashboardPagePlus()

Dashboard Page with a right sidebar

dashboardHeaderPlus()

Create a header for a dashboard page

Right Sidebar

Right sidebar elements

rightSidebar()

AdminLTE2 dashboard right sidebar

rightSidebarTabContent()

AdminLTE2 tab content

rightSidebarMenu()

AdminLTE2 right sidebar menu

rightSidebarMenuItem()

AdminLTE2 right sidebar menu item

menuIcon()

AdminLTE2 menu icon item

menuInfo()

AdminLTE2 menu info item

Box functions

Functions that are designed to create new boxes

boxPlus()

Create a box for the main body of a dashboard

gradientBox()

AdminLTE2 gradient box

widgetUserBox()

AdminLTE2 widget user box

socialBox()

AdminLTE2 social box

Items that are internal to box function

do not use when developing a shiny app

dropdownItem()

Create a box dropdown item

dropdownItemList()

Create a box dropdown item list

dropdownDivider()

Create a box dropdown divider

Box extra elements

Functions that are designed to be inserted inside boxes

descriptionBlock()

AdminLTE2 description block

boxPad()

AdminLTE2 vertical block container

userListItem()

AdminLTE2 user list item

todoListItem()

AdminLTE2 todo list item

navPills()

AdminLTE2 nav pill container

navPillsItem()

AdminLTE2 nav pill item

productList()

AdminLTE2 product list container

productListItem()

AdminLTE2 product item

accordion()

accordionItem()

AdminLTE2 accordion item

timelineBlock()

AdminLTE2 timeline block

timelineStart()

AdminLTE2 timeline starting point

timelineEnd()

timelineLabel()

AdminLTE2 timeline label

timelineItem()

AdminLTE2 timeline item

timelineItemMedia()

AdminLTE2 timeline media item

boxProfileItemList()

AdminLTE2 box profile item container

boxProfileItem()

AdminLTE2 user post

userPostToolItemList()

userPostToolItem()

AdminLTE2 user post tool item

userPostMedia()

AdminLTE2 user post media

Buttons

new buttons (not action buttons as in shiny! Only for external or internal link)

appButton()

AdminLTE2 special large button

socialButton()

AdminLTE2 social button

Extra elements

Elements to be placed everywhere

Custom shadows
